page.title: 07Where People Work.
page.content: The Industry of the area. We found that our area was mainly rural and residential,but there were a few small industries.These included Sessions Printers,Eborcraft Office Furnishings,Vickers Instruments and British Button Industries. The two largest companies are Rowntree Mackintosh and Portasilo/Portacabin. Eborcraft Furnishing employs......34 British Buttons..................100 Sessions.....................200-250 Vickers..........................350 Rowntree Mackintosh approx 7000 There were also three small industrial estates,but they are in the process of construction at the present time.
